title: Please Identify
content:
What font is this? If you're unsure, do you know of a common font that is very similar?

Thanks!

Taken from 'Desiring God' by John Piper:

[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/I4WHasd.jpg[/IMG]
author: icor1031
